sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-modal :visible="show" title="Add/Edit Subscriber" @ok="handleOk" @cancel="handleCancel">
    <b-form @submit.stop.prevent="handleOk">
      <!-- Name Field -->
      <b-form-group label="Name">
        <b-form-input v-model="localSubscriber.name" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <!-- Registration Number Field -->
      <b-form-group label="Registration Number">
        <b-form-input v-model="localSubscriber.registration_number" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <!-- City/Town Field -->
      <b-form-group label="City/Town">
        <b-form-input v-model="localSubscriber.city_town" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <!-- State Field -->
      <b-form-group label="State">
        <b-form-input v-model="localSubscriber.state" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <!-- Pincode Field -->
      <b-form-group label="Pincode">
        <b-form-input v-model="localSubscriber.pincode" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <!-- Phone Field -->
      <b-form-group label="Phone">
        <b-form-input v-model="localSubscriber.phone" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <!-- Email Field -->
      <b-form-group label="Email">
        <b-form-input type="email" v-model="localSubscriber.email" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <!-- Category Field -->
      <b-form-group label="Category">
        <b-form-select v-model="localSubscriber.category" :options="categories"></b-form-select>
      </b-form-group>
      <!-- Type Field -->
      <b-form-group label="Type">
        <b-form-select v-model="localSubscriber.stype" :options="types"></b-form-select>
      </b-form-group>
    </b-form>
  </b-modal>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    show: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    },
    subscriber: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => ({})
    },
    categories: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    },
    types: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      localSubscriber: { ...this.subscriber }
    };
  },
  watch: {
    subscriber(newVal) {
      this.localSubscriber = { ...newVal };
    },
    show(newVal) {
      if (newVal) {
        this.localSubscriber = { ...this.subscriber };
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleOk() {
      this.$emit('save', this.localSubscriber);
      this.$emit('update:show', false); // Close modal after save
    },
    handleCancel() {
      this.$emit('update:show', false); // Close modal on cancel
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Add your custom styles here if necessary */
</style>
